name: Lost Loop
description:
An ancient mayan temple was discovered deep within the Mexican jungle. A team of scientist set out to study the place, but after a misterious event, all communications stopped.

You play as Amelia, an agent sent to the temple to investigate what happened to the research team.

Controls
  • WASD - Movement
  • Space - Jump
  • Shift - Sprint
  • E- Interact
  • R - Rewind time
Credits

The game was developped as a graduation project by the Ynov video game M1 .

GAME DESIGN
  • Richard ARNAUD-NECKERAUER
  • Paul ROUMIGUIERE
ART

  • Sébastien SOLINAS
  • Elsa MORETA
